citations.desc: ATTENDING VETERINARIAN AND ADEQUATE VETERINARY CARE (DEALERS AND EXHIBITORS).
citations.narrative:
(b) Each dealer or exhibitor shall establish and maintain programs of adequate veterinary care.
In the kennel facility there is one ten year old female Shih-tzu, ID #283, named Mattie May, whose right eye is
cloudy over 1/2 of it's surface. The animal needs to be evaluated by the attending veterinarian. The dealer must
maintain written documentation of the evaluation and all treatment.
Affects one adult. Correct by May 15, 2015
The inspection and exit briefing was conducted by the facility Representative.

narrative:
2.40(b)
ATTENDING VETERINARIAN AND ADEQUATE VETERINARY CARE (DEALERS AND EXHIBITORS).
(b) Each dealer or exhibitor shall establish and maintain programs of adequate veterinary care.
In the kennel facility there is one ten year old female Shih-tzu, ID #283, named Mattie May, whose right eye is
cloudy  over 1/2 of it's surface.  The animal needs to be evaluated by the attending veterinarian.  The dealer must
maintain written documentation of the evaluation and all treatment.
Affects one adult.                                                                                     Correct by May 15, 2015
The inspection and exit briefing was conducted by the facility Representative.
